briefdescription.para: Size of frame control in octets.
Size of sequence number in octets.
Size of command frame identifier in octets.

detaileddescription.para: Convenient way of checking if MAC command or data.
Convenient way of checking if MAC command.

briefdescription.para: Mask for checking frame pending processing based on ack. requested and being a MAC command frame.
Mask for checking ack. sending based on ack. requested and being a MAC command or data frame.

detaileddescription.para: Note - arbitrary number and could make it easy by sending all beacons using beacon notify indication.
Note - can't have more than 16 for 2.4GHz.

briefdescription.para: Symbol duration in microseconds (2450 MHz O-QPSK).
The number of symbols per octet (2450 MHz O-QPSK).
Preamble field length in symbols (2450 MHz O-QPSK).
SFD field length in symbols (2450 MHz O-QPSK).
The maximum PSDU size (in octets) the PHY shall be able to receive.
RX-to-TX or TX-to-RX maximum turnaround time (in symbol periods).
The number of symbols forming a superframe slot when the superframe order is equal to 0.
The number of symbols forming a superframe when the superframe order is equal to 0.
The number of symbols for energy detect scan.
The maximum number of octets added by the MAC sublayer to the MAC payload of a beacon frame.
The number of slots contained in any superframe.
The number of symbols forming the basic time period used by the CSMA-CA algorithm.
The number of symbols for receive ack. timeout.
Get frame pointer from length buffer pointer.
Get length buffer pointer from frame pointer.
Values of frame type in Frame Control.

detaileddescription.para: Device is a coordinator but not a PAN coordinator.
Automatically wait for ack. after transmit completes.
Automatically send ack. after receive completes.

simplesect.para: Depending on implementation, these may be a copy of the config. settings. PalRadio154SetCfg must be used to update the configuration. The return structure must be manipulated for changing the configuration.

detaileddescription.para:
channel
Channel to set.
Sets the radio channel in the device.

Current operating channel.
Gets the radio channel in the device.

level
Tx power level in dBm.
Actual power level may differ from nominal level given by level. Radio implementation may limit upper and lower bounds as well as available steps. Use PalRadioGetTxPower() to read actual Tx power level.

Actual Tx power level.
Actual power level may differ from nominal level set by PalRadio154SetTxPower(). Radio implementation may limit upper and lower bounds as well as available steps.

dueTime
Due time for energy detect (0 = immediate).
true if successfully executed.
Perform energy detect and return RSSI to determine channel status.

pTxBuf
Tx buffer, with length in first octet.
Transmit data from supplied buffer.

dueTime
Due time (0 = immediate).
true if successfully executed.
Transmit data from previously supplied buffer at dueTime. If dueTime is 0, transmit immediately.

simplesect.para: Buffer must have been set up prior to starting.

detaileddescription.para:
pRxBuf
Rx buffer.
Receive data into supplied buffer.

dueTime
Due time (0 = immediate).
timeoutUsec
Rx timeout (0 = no timeout).
true if receive started as requested, false otherwise.
Receive data into previously supplied buffer at dueTime. If dueTime is 0, receive immediately. If timeoutUsec > 0, timeoutUsec will signal end of receive period.

simplesect.para: Buffer must have been set up prior to starting.

memberdef.argsstring: (uint8_t rfChan, uint8_t modulation, uint8_t txPhy, int8_t txPower)

briefdescription.para: Stop continuous Tx or Rx operation.
